PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-19542008-12-19,  INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActCompetition Act
PrecisAppointment of MELANIE AITKEN of Ottawa, Ontario, as Commissioner of Competition, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new Commissioner of Competition is appointed, or for a term of one year, whichever is shorter, effective January 12, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
